name: Uncle john M4A1 mania (UNDER DEVELOPMENT)
description:
Walk around in the most adventurous way, with two useless guards and a M4A1 that doesn't do any damage. Nice scenery in this game I say eh?  don't fall in void there is no way to respawn.  

 

I didn't have time to create a guide but. Press W to walk ahead, press SS for reverse, A for left, and D for right. Press the space bar to jump and left-click the mouse to shoot and move the mouse in the direction you want the player to see.
